attributes.action: Instigate an investigation into the allegations that data produced by the East Anglia CRU was skewed to meet a political motive, and to initiate an independent (non-IPCC) re-assessment of CO2 driven climate change theory, before making any further commitments to climate related legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Present Government “climate change” policy, based on CO2 driven warming is likely to make massive changes to our way of life. Energy prices will rise, and there is likely to be a shortfall in supply. The knock on effect will negatively impact personal lives, industry, and environment

Tens of thousands of scientists dispute the CO2 driven climate change model. There is no consensus, and scientific history proves the majority is not always right!

The momentum of the “climate change” juggernaut is almost unstoppable. It will take a courageous Prime Minister to  ignore the zealots, and re-assess the evidence, but it’s the right thing to do!

A lot of ordinary (non demonstrating) people are seriously concerned about the consequences of current climate related policy. In a financially impoverished country it cannot be right to encumber the country with massive further debt following dubious evidence! There is no imminent “tipping point” that the alarmists will have you believe. If current “warming” theory follows the 70’s “cooling” into the trashcan, history (and the electorate) will judge this Government harshly indeed!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
